entities.name: riddle
entities.description: The main character's name is revealed as Riddle. He is described as someone who does not feel affection for his friends.

entities.name: mrs cole
entities.description: Mrs Cole is a person who has confided in the narrator about something related to Riddle.

relationships.description: Riddle's secret was revealed by Mrs Cole to the narrator.
Riddle told a secret to the narrator, which he later regretted.
